1: Shout out praises to the Lord, all the earth!
2: Worship[b] the Lord with joy. Enter his presence with joyful singing.
3: Acknowledge that the Lord is God. He made us and we belong to him,[c] we are his people, the sheep of his pasture.
4: Enter his gates with thanksgiving, and his courts with praise. Give him thanks. Praise his name.
5: For the Lord is good. His loyal love endures,[d] and he is faithful through all generations.[e]
